headline: Citizens Financial Group Announces Prime Rate Change
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., December 18, 2024--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) announced today that Citizens Bank, N.A. has decreased its prime lending rate to 7.50 percent from 7.75 percent, effective Thursday, December 19, 2024.
